item.title: Coinbase will list Euler (EUL)
item.description: On August 6th, Coinbase will provide support for Euler (EUL) on the Ethereum network (ERC-20 token). If the liquidity conditions are fulfilled, trading will commence on August 6, 2025, at 9 a.m. Pacific Time or thereafter. Once there is an adequate supply of the asset, the EUL-USD trading pair will be gradually introduced.

item.title: Spot Gold Breaks Above $3390/oz for the First Time Since July 24th
item.description: On August 5th, the spot gold broke through $3390/oz. This was the first time since July 24th, with an intraday increase of 0.48%. (IG)

item.title: LookOnChain: Coinbase to List Mamo (MAMO)
item.description: On August 5th, Coinbase will commence providing support for Mamo (MAMO) on the Base network. In the event that liquidity conditions are fulfilled, trading will initiate on August 6, 2025, at 9:00 AM Pacific Time or subsequently. Once an adequate supply of these assets becomes available, the MAMO-USD trading pair will be progressively launched.

item.title: In the past 24 hours, there has been a total of $365 million in liquidations across the network, primarily affecting long positions.
item.description: On August 5th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total value that was liquidated across the entire network amounted to $365 million. There were $236 million in long liquidations and $129 million in short liquidations.During the past 24 hours, a total of 127,776 people were liquidated globally. The largest single liquidation took place on Hyperliquid - BTC-USD, with a total of $5.165 million.

item.title: Shipping company Robin Energy has completed a $3 million Bitcoin allocation
item.description: On August 5th, as reported by BitcoinNews, the Cyprus-based shipping company Robin Energy has finished allocating $3 million worth of Bitcoin and it is being held in custody by Anchorage Digital Bank.

item.title: The Atlanta Fed's GDPNow model initially estimates that the US Q3 GDP growth rate is 2.5%, up from the previous estimate of 2.1%.
item.description: On August 5th, the GDPNow model of the Atlanta Fed initially projected that the growth rate of the US third-quarter GDP would be 2.5%, which was an increase from the previously estimated 2.1%. (FXStreet)

item.title: Upbit Exchange Trading Volume Rebounds: XRP, ETH, BTC Hold Top Three Spots
item.description: On August 5th, based on CoinGecko data, in the past 24 hours, the trading volume on Upbit has rebounded to $19.64 billion, showing a 24-hour increase of 10.6%.The XRP/KRW trading pair accounted for 21.74% of the trading volume and ranked first in the Korean Won (KRW) market. The remaining top five were: ETH, BTC, GAS, SOL.

item.title: The Succinct Prover Network has been officially deployed on the mainnet, enabling the native token PROVE.
item.description: August 5th. The Succinct Prover Network is an Ethereum-based decentralized marketplace for prover networks. It enables various applications to submit zero-knowledge proof (ZK proof) requests, which are then competitively verified by independent provers. The goal is to allow developers to use zero-knowledge technology without the need for custom configurations, facilitating the construction of secure, transparent, and scalable cryptographic infrastructure.This system will support various platforms. Ethereum has already identified ZK technology as a key focus for its future development. Additionally, the system also supports high-speed rollups, which are suitable for handling computationally intensive applications processing tens of thousands of transactions per second, such as trading platforms and AI agents.The network's architecture adopts a design of off-chain execution and on-chain settlement, similar to Layer 2 solutions. Proofs are periodically submitted to Ethereum, allowing

item.title: 「Insider Trader」 Increases Short Position to $132 Million, BTC Short Liquidation Price $114,210
item.description: August 5th. The "Insider Trader" @qwatio increased his short position by 25 minutes ago, raising the scale to $1.32 billion. Previously, his $3 billion short position had been liquidated and decreased to less than $1 billion through several liquidations. After the market drop tonight, he added to his position. Currently, his BTC short liquidation price is $114,210 and his ETH short liquidation price is $3,822, with an overall unrealized profit of around $1.4 million.

item.title: Binance Alpha has now launched PROVE, with a reported market cap of $180 million.
item.description: On August 5th, Binance Alpha has now initiated PROVE. It once soared and broke through $1.67 and is now in a retracement to $0.925. Currently, the market capitalization stands at $180 million.
